places.name: Riverside Park
places.description: A beautiful park along the river with walking trails, picnic areas, and a playground. Perfect for family outings and outdoor activities.

places.name: Heritage Museum
places.description: Explore the rich history of our area through interactive exhibits, historical artifacts, and educational programs for all ages.

places.name: Downtown Shopping District
places.description: Discover unique local shops, boutiques, and restaurants in our charming downtown area. Support local businesses while enjoying the historic architecture.

places.name: Mountain View Winery
places.description: Award-winning local winery offering tours, tastings, and special events with breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains.

places.name: Lakeside Golf Club
places.description: 18-hole championship golf course with stunning lake views, a pro shop, and a restaurant. Open to the public with membership options available.

places.name: Artisan Marketplace
places.description: A collective of local artists and craftspeople showcasing handmade goods, artwork, and unique gifts. Regular workshops and demonstrations.

places.name: Sunset Beach
places.description: A pristine beach area with swimming, boating, and fishing opportunities. Famous for its spectacular sunset views and annual summer festivals.

places.name: Innovation Tech Hub
places.description: A modern coworking space and business incubator supporting local entrepreneurs and tech startups with resources, mentorship, and networking events.
